comment:
* A message pattern "part", representing a pattern parsing event.
     * There is a part for the start and end of a message or argument,
     * for quoting and escaping of and with ASCII apostrophes,
     * and for syntax elements of "complex" arguments.

variables.name: type
variables.comment: After pattern parsing, the parts are effectively immutable.

methods.name: public Type getType()
methods.comment:
* Returns the type of this part.
         * @return the part type.

methods.name: public int getIndex()
methods.comment:
* Returns the pattern string index associated with this Part.
         * @return this part's pattern string index.

methods.name: public int getLength()
methods.comment:
* Returns the length of the pattern substring associated with this Part.
         * This is 0 for some parts.
         * @return this part's pattern substring length.

methods.name: public int getLimit()
methods.comment:
* Returns the pattern string limit (exclusive-end) index associated with this Part.
         * Convenience method for getIndex()+getLength().
         * @return this part's pattern string limit index, same as getIndex()+getLength().

methods.name: public int getValue()
methods.comment:
* Returns a value associated with this part.
         * See the documentation of each part type for details.
         * @return the part value.

methods.name: public ArgType getArgType()
methods.comment:
* Returns the argument type if this part is of type ARG_START or ARG_LIMIT,
         * otherwise ArgType.NONE.
         * @return the argument type for this part.

methods.name: public String toString()
methods.comment: * @return a string representation of this part.

methods.name: public boolean equals(Object other)
methods.comment:
* @param other another object to compare with.
         * @return true if this object is equivalent to the other one.
